title: Where to find a coach to help me improve?
body: I want to get better at the game, I was wondering if anyone knew where I could find a cheap/free coach to help me improve.

replies.body: Can do cheap coaching, coached 20+ people so far for mid/jg d1 player btw

Depends what you wanna learn.
Watching streams and boosts your knowledge on the fundamentals of League.
Also NightBlue3 has videos based on jungle which are educational(ish).

**[Purplesidegg](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/EV6P9OEw-coaching)** (diamond) and **[best khazix oce](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=26126)** (diamond/master) both offer A+ coaching at reasonable rates. 
In terms of free coaching, [**Litharrale**](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=61956) is probably the highest ranked coach for free unless you find somone here on the boards. 

Alternatively, feel free to [browse and find your own.](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coaches.php?serverRegion=OCE&role=all&searchChampion=0&language=0&dateStart=&timeStart=&dateEnd=&timeEnd=)

Good luck ♥
